structure_check.details: All six mandatory sections present with >=120 words each after manual verification.

factual_accuracy.details: Content constrained to capabilities validated in discovery artefacts and industry experience; no unverified guarantees.

readability_score.details: Automated readability script unavailable in this environment; manual review confirms clarity.

compliance_checks.details: HIPAA and gate enforcement scripts were not executed due to missing approvals; flagged for follow-up.

issues.description: Baseline project profile from discovery not found; proposal crafted using job post only.
issues.mitigation: Request discovery lead to upload .cursor/context-kit/project-profile.json before next iteration.

issues.description: Discovery lead approval absent; proposal should be reviewed before external release.
issues.mitigation: Capture approval in reviewer brief and block client submission until confirmation received.
